channel.title: Client Background help
channel.description:
pl0x help this is a screenie of me on my server:
[IMG]http://i266.photobucket.com/albums/ii265/reaper12316/normal_render123png.jpg[/img]
i need that made into a client background with 765 x 503 pixels please some1 who knows what they are doing, help me.

item.title: Client Background help
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

So that exact picture is to be the background of the login screen? Save it as a file and then edit it in the Sprite class, if it is a renamed client.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Background help
item.dc:creator: @God11 God11
item.description:
@God11 wrote:

just go into your client files and scroll down untill you find your client background pic and click edit and then just paste that pic in the back ground but resize it after you paste

Read full topic
